ul.li: The "background-quantity" property sets the number of times the image will repeat, if a background image is specified.

body.p: If statement above is true, the flag image of this paragraph should have a background quantity of infinite (repeats continuously) The rule applied is "p {background-quantity: infinite;}" Also body.h3: This h3 heading should have a background quantity of 3 (x direction) for its oval button image. The rule applied is "h3 {background-quantity: 3;}" Also "h3 {background-repeat: repeat-x; Also "h3 {background-image: url(ovalbbut.gif);}". body.p: All other properties of this page should be UA-default. This is a paragraph like the one above. However, it may not be large enough to support a background image.
